_comment: This file is generated. Please edit .homeycompose/app.json instead.

description.en: Customizable real-time data widgets for your dashboards.
description.nl: Aanpasbare real-time data widgets voor je dashboards.

hint.en: Set a boolean that can be used in DataVista widgets.
hint.nl: Zet een boolean die gebruikt kan worden in DataVista widgets.

titleFormatted.en: [Gauge configuration] Set axes color to [[color1]] at value [[colorOffset1]], [[color2]] at [[colorOffset2]], [[color3]] value [[colorOffset3]], [[color4]] at [[colorOffset4]], [[color5]]  at [[colorOffset5]] for configuration id [[identifier]]
titleFormatted.nl: [Meter configuratie] Zet as kleuren naar [[color1]] op waarde [[colorOffset1]], [[color2]] at [[colorOffset2]], [[color3]] at [[colorOffset3]], [[color4]] at [[colorOffset4]], [[color5]] at [[colorOffset5]] voor configuratie id [[identifier]]

hint.en: Set configuration that can be used in Advanced Gauge widgets.
hint.nl: Zet configuratie die gebruikt kan worden in Geavanceerde Meter widgets.

hint.en: Set a percentage that can be used in DataVista widgets.
hint.nl: Zet een percentage dat gebruikt kan worden in DataVista widgets.

titleFormatted.en: [Progress bar configuration] Set progress bar color to [[color1]] at value [[colorOffset1]], [[color2]] at [[colorOffset2]], [[color3]] value [[colorOffset3]], [[color4]] at [[colorOffset4]], [[color5]]  at [[colorOffset5]] for configuration id [[identifier]]

hint.en: Set configuration that can be used in Progress Bar widgets.
hint.nl: Zet configuratie die gebruikt kan worden in Voortgangsbalk widgets.

titleFormatted.en: [Range] Set range [[identifier]] from [[min]] to [[max]] with value [[value]] (unit [[unit]] is placed [[unitPosition]]). Overwrite value with label [[label]].
titleFormatted.nl: [Bereik] Zet bereik [[identifier]] van [[min]] tot [[max]] met waarde [[value]] (eenheid [[unit]] is [[unitPosition]] geplaatst). Overschrijf waarde met label [[label]].

hint.en: Set a range that can be used in DataVista widgets.
hint.nl: Zet een bereik dat gebruikt kan worden in DataVista widgets.

titleFormatted.en: [Status] Set status [[identifier]] to [[color]] with text [[text]] (attract attention: [[attention]])
titleFormatted.nl: [Status] Zet status [[identifier]] op [[color]] met tekst [[text]] (trek aandacht: [[attention]])

hint.en: Set a status that can be used in DataVista widgets.
hint.nl: Zet status die gebruikt kan worden in DataVista widgets.

hint.en: Set a text that can be used in DataVista widgets.
hint.nl: Zet een tekst die gebruikt kan worden in DataVista widgets.

title.en: Minimum value (leave empty to use datasource range)
title.nl: Minimumwaarde (leeglaten om bereik van databron te gebruiken)

title.en: Maximum value (leave empty to use datasource range)
title.nl: Maximumwaarde (leeglaten om bereik van databron te gebruiken)
